pkgmetadata.longdescription: Two-Sample Kuiper Test // This function performs the two-sample Kuiper test to assess the anomaly of continuous, one- dimensional probability distributions. References used for this method are (1). Kuiper, N. H. (1960). DOI:10.1016/S1385-7258(60)50006-0 and (2). Paltani, S. (2004). DOI:10.1051/0004-6361:20034220.
